intro: Rungia densiflora, commonly known as the dense-flowered rungia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Central and South America. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its compact growth habit and dense clusters of small, white to pinkish flowers. Its leaves are typically oval-shaped with a slightly hairy surface. Rungia densiflora is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and prolonged blooming period.
